name: Sonic EX: Classic Dilapidated Plant Demo
name_original: Sonic EX: Classic Dilapidated Plant Demo
description:
A part of my collection of old Sonic fangame builds.

Original Sonic games and assets Copyright Sega.

This build has a few errors, where it cannot load the background music.

Made with Genesis Engine by TechnoSuperguy, Damizean, Rougeyoshi, Alex Z, Kain, and Chaos Rush.

Controls:

CONTROLS:

Right -Move right

Left -Move left

Down -Look down

Space -Jump

Down+Space-Spindash 

Right/Left+Down -Rolling

Fire Shield+Space+Space -Air Dash

Water Shield+Space+Space -Air Bounce

Electric Shield+Space+Space -Double Jump
